p: Since Dec 2019, the novel coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) has spread rapidly around the world and infected >10 million people hitherto [1]. The pathogen was identified as a novel, highly contagious severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), which can invade the human body through angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE-2) [2]. The clinical manifestations of COVID-19 include fever, dry cough, dyspnea, myalgia, fatigue etc, and severe cases can rapidly develop into acute respiratory distress syndrome, septic shock, and multiple organ dysfunction syndrome [3].
